div.p: RECITATIVO or Recitative, in Music, a kind of singing, that differs but little from ordinary pronunciation ; such as that in which the several parts of the liturgy are rehearsed in cathedrals ; or that in which the actors commonly deliver themselves on the theatre at the opera, when they are to express some action or passion, relate some event, or reveal some design.
